website_summaries.verdict: If you like pockets and need a bag with a shoulder strap, this 44-inch bag might be a good choice for you.
pros: Has an adjustable shoulder strap and 4 pockets for ample carrying space
Unique rounded bottom makes packing easy
cons: Some complaints of the zippers sticking after repeated use

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Were using this bag right now on our vacation. I cannot believe the room in this bag. We arrived at our destination via airplane and the items stayed perfect. The room in it as I stated was great with all the zipper compartments. From the looks on our suitcases when we arrived this bag and contents did great. We were going to put in the overhead but they offered to check it for free due to the crowded flight. Again it survived the abuse from those gentle bag "people"
customer_reviews.author: Bob the wrench

customer_reviews.title: Great Garment bag for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great garment bag for the price. My husband very rarely travels with a suit but when he does he always has a wrinkled suit. This suit bag not only has enough room for a suit but a whole weekend worth of clothes. The bag becomes slightly bulky but it definitely fits and fits in a small overhead bin.
customer_reviews.author: Kepaul

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great garment bag for the price. I would purchase again. I used my bag on one fight so far. I put one suit, three dress shirts, two of my wife's dresses and one pair of shoes. I could have fit one more garment. The bag was easy to carry and fit perfectly in the overhead bin. The three straps held the clothes in place. However, as expected some of the clothes got a little wrinkled. (When you fold the bag you have to expect a little wrinkling. No bag can guarantee no wrinkles.) Hanging them up as soon as you get to your hotel or your destination in the closet right away fixes most of the wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Solid build. Awkward Shoulder Strap. TERRIBLE JINGLY ZIPPERS!
customer_reviews.text: Every other characteristic of this bag is secondary. The zippers drive me INSANE! The jingle likes bells. They are industrial and don't seem like they'll ever give me a problem... But! It sounds like Christmas every time I move. I'm already planning to buy some zipper silencers (Yes. They are a "thing.") to fix this issue. If the manufacturer used a rubberized pull tab, it would be a 5 star item. They are cheap and can be found for between $5 and $10 easily. You could even use some paracord if you're the type that has it laying around. Sincerely, "accidentally jingle bells."
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Perlera

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: There were some less expensive options available but I am happy I purchased this one. Construction is solid. I waited until my trip via airplane and rental car to post. The zippers feel very durable. The extra pockets are really nice for dress shoes belts, accessories etc. the included hanger is much appreciated. Inside the main compartment it was nice to have three adjustable straps to secure the clothing. I traveled with one suit, two dress shirts and additional slacks. I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: RyeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, slim
customer_reviews.text: Nice, slim, well made product. Used only one round trip flight so far, but everything on it seems well made. Zippers are robust, anchoring of handles and shoulder strap are secure. Held 2 suits and 2 dresses for a wedding. 2 dresses down first, suits on top and then folded the bottom of the dresses up and back over the suits to all lay pretty flat. Fit easily in overhead bins on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: gumby

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The bag was lightweight and easy to use. I have a few suggestions for improvement. On the handle straps, perhaps include a velcro holder to keep the handles together. For hanging garments: I was unable to hang more than three garments in the space provided. The description suggests that I could have hung more, but the top piece was not sufficient for more than three, and that took effort.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, durable and easy to use. Cloths stay nice, no wrinkles using the straps. Zippers are heavy duty, instead of putting the hangers in the provided loops, I had 1 sport coat, I suit, 4 shirts, 2 slacks and a few golf shirts. I used a zip tie on the top of the hanger and slipped it into the metal ring that is attached to the bag. I had no issues closing the bag and it worked great. For less cloths you can use the regular loops. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: steve c

customer_reviews.title: This bag is really handy and pretty durable overall
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really handy and pretty durable overall. I've made a half dozen trips with a full suit and several shirts inside. It does the job and hasn't failed me yet. I like the internal hanger, and the internal strap to keep everything in place while carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Holds 5 complete suits for 6’ man easily!
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently on a trip to Dubai and packed this amazing garment bag with 5 complete suits comprised of suit jacket, shirt, pants, ties, socks, shoes, & this monster took it all! The strap for carrying works well, it’s light weight, the strap for sliding over your luggage handle works nicely for piggybacking and it held up to checked baggage loading and unloading at O’Hare international & Dubai. Best money I’ve spent in a long time and well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: P.McCut

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It worked perfectly for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It worked perfectly for my needs. I had two suits (2 jackets, 2 shirts, two pants) for a trip and they both fit neatly in the bag. I could also fit a pair of shoes, underwear and T-shirts. The length and width when folded once: 21 in x 24 in, which technically does not fall exactly within the limits of the carry-on luggage. But I was totally fine and had no problems on a small domestic U.S. flight. The material is pretty flexible, so there it can easily fit in the overhead. If you really have to, you could probably fold it one more time. It's convenient. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tm77

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Took on a get away with a lady friend and it was perfect! Kept clothes from wrinkling, Kept clothes in place, Kept everything perfectly positioned when unfolded and reopened. Even the Bellhop complimented the bag & it’s simplicity. Then when returned home, hung right back in closet with built in hook! A lil more $ then the computing, but so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Not Fully Enclosed When in Full Hang Mode
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag primarily for suit storage and occasional travel. When folded for travel, this bag fully zips around. However, I was hopeful this bag could be fully zipped around my suit when hanging in the closet (to keep out moths). While the zipper zips up the middle to the top, there is an 11" opening/gap (left to right) across the top (see photo). It would have been nice to have the option to fully secure this opening. If not with a zipper, Velcro strips would have been a nice option to complete the suit enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Needs a built-in hanger.
customer_reviews.text: A good solid bag, but it needs a hanger. My wife insists on unhooking the hangers from inside the bag and hang them on the closet rod, and when I unhook it from the closet And put them back inside the bag things fall off the hangers and end up wrinkled. I ended up buying a different bag with the built-in hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Well-made bag, especially considering its price. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: Well-made bag, especially considering its price. However, I had to re-iron my suit and shirt after arriving at my destination. Unfortunately, I didn't find that this bag prevented wrinkles while traveling with it as a carry-on on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very good garmet bag
customer_reviews.text: The organization of the bag does increase the likelihood that your clothes will arrive unwrinkled and allows you to organize your packing. The way the hold loops are designed it does limit the number of garments that can be hung and I wish it had one more. It was very durable and could be used as the only bag you carry for a short trip.
customer_reviews.author: dak mak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suit bag for frequent travels.
customer_reviews.text: Strong bag with several compartments. Good for holding two suits. Not sure if it can hold more without being too bulky. Definitely counts as a carry on luggage by itself. Recommended. Hopefully it lasts me for a long time, which is what I expect from the material and apparent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Xu

customer_reviews.title: Big, sturdy and well design
customer_reviews.text: Took these on a 10 hours+ flight in the cabin on the way out and as a registered luggage on the way back. It had two costumes and two dresses. No pb in the cabine as I could unfold it in the coat cabinet, but on the way back there were some wrinkles which was expected. In conclusion would recommend these but wouldn't pack them as I did.
customer_reviews.author: North Cali

customer_reviews.title: It did the job.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bag is nowhere near the one that came with a set of luggage we bought thirty years ago, but for a one-shot flight from NY to California with a suit and a tuxedo, it did the job. No terrible wrinkles and lots of extra space for storage. Best of all, the price was right, even if I never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Tom

customer_reviews.title: The hangers don't stay up
customer_reviews.text: If you leave this hanging down its almost worthless. If you fold it up and zip it up, when you get where you are going, all the clothes have fallen and are all wrinkled in a ball. You might as well throw your cloths in a bag it works the same with this. Hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Garment Bag
customer_reviews.text: After using a garment bag for a couple of years the main zipper broke which led me to look for a new bag with a stronger zipper. I have only used this bag a couple of times, but it seems to be a great bag. It has plenty of room for multiple suits and shirts to hang, smaller pockets for under garments, belts and even a pair of shoes. I think they could go a step further and add two additional small pockets to the top inside.
customer_reviews.author: Casper Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for taking my suit overseas.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a two week trip to Italy to carry a suit for my wedding. My suit was in great shape when we arrived. It was folded in half for a short flight and hung up on our overseas flight. It was very easy to carry through the airport and on trains. I also had my dress shoes and a shirt in this bag the entire trip. Nice extra pockets and very lightweight and durable. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: back in SD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Great garment bag - used it for a cross country flight for a wedding and our suits stayed dry cleaners neat, even while folded in half and tucked into an overhead bin on a plane. Highly recommend this product and this seller. Durable, not too heavy, lots of space, easy to hang and/or fold. Looks good, too! Product arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Iona MacTavish

customer_reviews.title: I liked the garment bag because I was able to pack ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the garment bag because I was able to pack a trench coat, an adult size terry cloth robe, and a business suit. also a dress shirt, the outside pockets were very handy, I placed my bible, several magazines, and a travel cap in the side pocket also. I'm very pleased with the quality of the garment bag material, strong, durable and light. The shoulder trap came in very handy and the entire bag presents a very professional business traveler's look.I I'm so glad that I purchased the garment bag I was really in need and looking for a professional looking bag. You did a great job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room, protects clothes from getting wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for traveling with formal attire. Used it for a few weddings and was able to get a tuxedo, shirts, gown, shoes a d accessories all packed in without issue. It fit in the overhead luggage compartment on the plane without issue. Shoulder strap makes for easy carry and the addition of the strap that allows it to be secured to your rolling luggae handle is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: David K Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good garment bag, does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: We needed a garment bag quickly to take on a cruise, and this one had good reviews. We were quite satisfied--the bag arrived in time for our trip, and we found it to be sturdy, adequately sized, with good features (I especially liked the shoulder strap, which made it easier to lug around). No complaints at all about this bag.
customer_reviews.author: MEHicks7101

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: I was able to pack 6 outfits in this bag with ease. It has hooks for hangers which is very convenient. There's also a strap on the back for hanging on your luggage. The carrying strap was comfortable on my shoulder as well. There are a multitude of pockets for packing extras like shoes, clothes and souvenirs. Overall, an excellent purchase. I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect weekend  wedding/graduation getaway bag
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a hanging bag for a graduation weekend away that would accommodate a suit coat and two of my dresses. This fit the bill and more. We also fit shoes and a few more hanging items. It's light and easily fit in the overhead on Southwest. I highly recommend this travel bag
customer_reviews.author: surfingreader

customer_reviews.title: If you need a garment bag, this is the one to buy
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I LOVE the garment bag. We traveled from Connecticut to Florida for a wedding. Our clothes were absolutely wrinkle-free given the fact we couldn’t hang the bag on the plane but had to fold it in half and store it above our seats. Absolutely did the job. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the material and the zipper (both very important) are really good. And the inside straps secure the clothing in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am presently on a trip, and this bag seems suitable for my needs. It arrived at my house in just a couple of days after I ordered it (thanks to the seller). The quality of the material and the zipper (both very important) are really good. And the inside straps secure the clothing in place. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 rating is that the fabric “hook” at the top is not as large as I’d like, so I couldn’t hook all of my hangers into it- I had to rubber band some of them together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Seems very durable. We have taken it on a road trip and a flight so far. It does fit well in the overhead bin and is lightweight on it's own. The follow-up with the seller was also great. They gave tips on proper usage etc. Would definitely recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this product and will probably try and use ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a lifesaver. I had to take two suits to a convention (a first for me) and needed a way to get it onto the airplane. This garment bag fit two suits, two dress shirts, my shoes, socks, and a polo shirt. It did really well with being checked. I'm really happy with this product and will probably try and use it for future trips even if I don't need to take my suits with me!
customer_reviews.author: MAZA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle!
customer_reviews.text: This garment bag is light in weight and appears to be sturdy. The many pockets will hold my husband's shoes, shirt, and tie with no problem. I have repeated my order of this same bag: one for a friend and one for my husband and me. Our's is a replacement for an older, clumsier garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: J Carol

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! I bought it for my 9yo, so she can put her solo costume. She preferred a pink 1 with a cute design. But I chose this 1 bc it has the right amount of pockets & most importantly, it has a shoulder strap. I was able to get it embroidered with her name, she happy with it now.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: A garment bag with so many pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this garment bag! I use it for photo and tv shoots and it has so many pockets that house all my accessories without having to drag around another bag. I can store multiple pairs of shoes, snacks, a binder, etc. However, when I start adding more items the bag gets heavier to carrier as any other bag would. I just have to remember to limit what I’m taking with me so I don’t make it too heavy to carry with my small frame. I have also received compliments on the bag from others as well. This was such a great find!
customer_reviews.author: dwong822

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: This thing works well enough for the price. It has plenty of storage and carries easily. If you don't want to spend a ton on a garment bag then this one is probably your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a carry on bag for a recent cruise. Didn't want everything crammed into a suitcase. Very lightweight and easy to carry. Hold a lot of items
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda R. Rose

customer_reviews.title: However my suits and Shirts transported nicely. Is a bit large for plane overhead bins
customer_reviews.text: The one zipper closer broke in the first use. However my suits and Shirts transported nicely. Is a bit large for plane overhead bins. Had to fold in half, after it was already zipped in half.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He has been very pleased with it. His suit travelled well, he was able to use it as his carry-on, and it had plenty of space for all his other essentials. I appreciate the heavy duty quality of the material and zippers. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bel4

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I did some research before I purchased this &, let me say, I was not disappointed. This held my suit, dress shirt, & 2 of my girlfriends dresses, with more room to spare. I also fit my shoes, socks, belt, iPad... I can keep going. There is plenty of storage. On top of that, I felt it was well made. I may even go as far as to say I would have felt comfortable plane side checking the bag, if needed. I would recommend to anyone that travels quite a bit with a suite.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag - was especially thrilled with all of the pockets!
customer_reviews.text: After much reading of reviews, I decided upon this garment bag because of its size and built-in hook so the bag could hang in a closet. Turned out the garment bag totally exceeded expectations. Extremely pleased with the size, quality, durability and design of the bag. Was especially thrilled with all of the pockets! Wire hangers were purchased separately. Definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Bag seems well thought out. Yet to test if it will be allowed as a carry on. That is why I primarily purchased it. The improvement I would recommend would be metal clips and rings for the shoulder strap but maybe these plastic units can take the light load.
customer_reviews.author: Robhart

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for the price. Sturdy, well constructed, pockets outside and in plus a lining that keeps the hanging clothes from the other interior pockets or anything else you may want to put inside. Also, there are several straps to keep the hanging items in place, not just one. All in all, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Right is Right

customer_reviews.title: I love all the extra pockets
customer_reviews.text: A ton of space! I love all the extra pockets. It fit 1 suit 3 dress shirts and two formal dresses. We also put like 4 pair of shoes and some toiletries in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: Great Garment Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great garment bag - we have only used it once so far but will be using it again at least 2 more times this summer. Looks great - made well. I have only one suggestion - the ring at the top to hold clothes hangers is not big enough. We have to attach a bigger ring so we could hang more garments (not that we had that many) but it would be better if the ring were a little bigger. Very well made bag.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Myers

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great carry on Bag for a three day trip. It held 1 man's suit, 2 men's slacks, 2 golf shirts and two women's dresses easily. Kept clothes wrinkle free and wasn't too heavy to carry between connecting flights.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, lightweight, great compartments
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful garment bag, a great bag for the price. It's lightweight, convenient, with helpful pockets. Sure beats what the mainline companies are selling. My husband loves this bag and takes it with him everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Slope Biker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Held up beautifully as carryon through airports and train stations throughout Europe. We carried tux, suit, and several dresses and stowed in overhead without difficulty. Clothes survived with minimum, if any, wrinkling.I rarely write reviews but this looks good and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It is very well designed, the hanging hook is inside which is excellent but it should be a bit larger - it does not fit easily over the rod. Other than that minor problem, it is everything I was looking for. Light weight, can add a number of hangers and they do not come out during travel, etc.
customer_reviews.author: shu

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at the number of compartments that the garment bag has and it was also very easy to carry with the shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the garment bag as far as how well it kept our garments during our trip. I was surprised at the number of compartments that the garment bag has and it was also very easy to carry with the shoulder strap
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're transporting on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold garments in position. Hook spots for hangers is met for the thin metal hangers, any heavy duty plastic won't fit. Military uniforms won't do well, first hand experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Holds many items
customer_reviews.text: Holds many items. used for short trips and even an international trip with 2 pouffy flower girl dresses. A man's suit. All the Accessories and shoes. And still had room. It was great no wrinkles and protected very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag fir my husband. We needed a garment bag fir his suit. We traveled to Europe and it arrived perfectly
customer_reviews.author: S. Dellapina

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bough one of thee to replace an old Brooks Brothers garment bag I had that cost over $200. This Prottoni is so well made...Im ordering a second one as backup!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality made of sturdy material. This is a well designed and quality constructed product that includes features other garment bags don't have including a hook to hang it up and a shoulder strap. I reallly can't think of anything I would add to imporove this product - it has every feature I need in a garment bag!
customer_reviews.author: Martin J. Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Almost Without Wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for my suit I was going to wear to my niece's wedding. Almost everything was without wrinkles but one shirt but I made sure the hotel had an ironing board. I was set!. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: liz lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: As a big guy, I purchased the right bag. Plenty of space for 2-3 suites plus shirts. Lots of pockets for ties, socks, and underwear. Strong straps and zippers. Plus, it can be taken on flights as your second carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: The bag is an excellent carrier to use
customer_reviews.text: The bag is an excellent carrier to use. I have so far used it in two occasions & had wonderful experience with it. My suits and other garments were kept in shape, without wrinkles. Even some friends who saw it were quite impressed with it especially the number of compartments to carry a number of items. The Prottoni bag is a perfect bag for any long distance traveler to a business meeting that takes some days stay. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Serious value for the price, and my suits and clothing stayed wrinkle-free as advertised. It feels a bit on the large side Length-by-Width-wise, but I had no problem taking it with me on a number of flights as a carry-on and never got stopped at the gate. As a side note, the interior zipping pockets for shoes or whatever were very useful and well-placed.
customer_reviews.author: k.s.

customer_reviews.title: this bag does just what it promises
customer_reviews.text: Bag is a bit lightweight, but for the price it was perfect. Held a lot of clothes, even went through baggage handlers on the way home.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie J. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I read the reviews on the bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews on the bag. This bag is functional and build with string materials. I thought you was only going g to use it for travel but its light and comfortable enough to use daily to put my suit it after work when I go to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: imgabrielangel

customer_reviews.title: Great bad
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. It keeps my suits and shirts in good order with minimal wrinkling. The pocket for shoes is great and works well. The zipper and material is solid and seems like it will last if it's not consistently overpacked. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great value. I needed a reliable bag for short ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I needed a reliable bag for short business trips; 1-2 suits and 3-4 dress shirts plus some under clothes and incidentals. After packing I noticed I had a little extra room so I put an extra pair of shoes and some gym clothes. I wasn’t sure if it would be accepted as overhead but the issue never came up for the domestic flight. The suits held up very well, the shirts needed a quick iron to get a few travel wrinkles out but it the three interior straps kept everything in place. Overall a useful piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.author: ZorSmilj

customer_reviews.title: Also it is easy to carry and very spacious
customer_reviews.text: This bag has several compartments that allows me to sort out my articles of clothing the way I want them arranged as opposed to stuffing all of them into one side pocket. Also it is easy to carry and very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: dockav

customer_reviews.title: Fits dour complete suit outfits!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exactly what my husband was looking for. The price point was excellent! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Dee

customer_reviews.title: He's happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It's huge. You can fit quite a number of things. Husband uses it to work when carrying uniforms around. He's happy with it. Con is the same, it's huge so not really practical for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Eri

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Lightweight but durable, can be packed small or puffed up with many good pockets. Also really helpful info sent in email that followed the pack. I just wish I had received it the same day as I received the product because I was already on a trip and could have used the tips (I hadn't seen the extra straps, etc...but I have now!)
customer_reviews.author: Jay Golden

customer_reviews.title: Well designed garment bag!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this garment bag for an up coming cruise. I’m very happy with the size and quality. We haven’t used it yet but I feel confident that this is perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The bag works perfectly to keep wrinkles out of clothes, even on long trips. It keeps my suit in great shape while traveling, requiring only minor touch-ups with a travel steamer upon arriving at my destination. My only complaint is that the bag is a little on the large side when folded, so it is hard to fit under the seat or in the overhead bin, especially on smaller planes.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyM

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: just got back from my first trip using this bag. it is great. i can fit 2 suits, 4 shirts, 2 pairs of slacks and it still folds easily (and my suits are 46XL). i was on a small commuter jet and gate checked it so I did not try to fit in the overhead, but I'm sure it would fit in the bigger planes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You don't need to spend a fortune to protect the suits you spent a fortune on :)
customer_reviews.text: Good solid garment bag. Rugged enough for good suits for cross country flights etc. Not ostentatious which is plus. Durable, good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: USAForensic, llc.

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy and clothes came out wrinkled. Ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: CandaceR

customer_reviews.title: Bought for flights
customer_reviews.text: Bought to bring a suit and a dress to a wedding. Hung on plane. Would not suggest for more than 2-3 items.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: withstood some intensive travel from NC to Colorado in the midst of holiday season. tightly packed overhead bins but our wedding clothes were well protected. Easy to pack with accessory pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Carme Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag worked perfectly. The suiit was ready to go after being passed through airports. Has lots of extra storage pockets which are nice.
customer_reviews.author: GPerkins2000

customer_reviews.title: great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I used the garment bag this weekend to carry 2 dance competition gowns/dresses. It was durable and travel friendly. The ball gowns were not wrinkled. I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: ddleafoley

customer_reviews.title: I am putting it to good use this weekend
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal garment bag! I am putting it to good use this weekend. This bag is well made with plenty of pockets for organization. Very durable and not overly sized.
customer_reviews.author: wisegyebri

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled, wrinkled, wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: If the whole point of buying this bag is that its supposed to prevent wrinkles, then it fails miserably. I used it as directed and my suits and shirts were wrinkled on arrival for my business trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My daughter used it to carry her wedding dress on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Welsh

customer_reviews.title: I forgot the bag folded up nice while full to fit in trunk of car keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag was delivered right on time as promised! I was able to pack 3 suits, 3 launder folded dress shirts in pockets. Also pocket for my tie holder and pajama set , small toiletry bag. The bag hook kept all my stuff neatly organized in the hotel room for the 3 day weekend. I forgot the bag folded up nice while full to fit in trunk of car keeping my suits fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoulder strap is excellent, and is removable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband. This bag is much sturdier than the ones that I looked at locally. The shoulder strap is excellent, and is removable!!! The picture doesn't do it justice. I highly recommend this product1
customer_reviews.author: suemc

customer_reviews.title: Best bag in years
customer_reviews.text: Professionally designed for the traveler in mind. Plenty of room for all travel items.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this bag
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this bag. I bring it as a carry on in airports and my suits are always like new. You have to use the straps inside for this product to work optimal. Highly recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for flying with a suit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this at the last minute because I had to fly back to my hometown with my suit for a wedding. I put a bunch of other button up shirts in there with it and my dress shoes in the outer pouch. Works great! Just what I needed. Was able to take it on the plane as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: computmaxer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Piece
customer_reviews.text: I carry it for weekend trips. My tux fits nicely and still looks sharp when I arrive. Plenty of pockets and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Gnostic Revenant

customer_reviews.title: All the features I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate durability until a few years form now, I have only used it once, it is great for a short trip.
customer_reviews.author: Duke McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Durable, spacious, and high quality
customer_reviews.text: The order for the bag shipped fast. The bag looks nice, is well made, offers plenty of room, and is comfortable carrying (either by using the handle or spoiler strap). I bought the 45 inch bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wag More, Bark Less

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Used it to transport a 3 piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Used it to transport a 3 piece linen suit out of state for a wedding. Carried the suit well and a bunch of other stuff. Should have gotten this much sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Craig G.

customer_reviews.title: zipper problems
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in the zipper quality of this bag after using this bag three times the zipper beginning to give me problems. Currently, I'm unable to sip up the middle of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travelling carryon... 😁
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my men..need to go to Georgia & told me he need to bring a suit and didn't have a suit bag .. & I surprise him & he love it..all the pockets inside.. Very nice ..
customer_reviews.author: Craig Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, and the person liked it. I haven't used it, so not much else to add.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Garment bag is perfect and provides excellent protection for all of your suits! When you unzip it to its full length, the two extra zipper pockets offer a great place for additional items needed to complement your outfit. The fabric is thick and sturdy and is worth the money, unlike many other garment bags on Amazon. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris Llaca

customer_reviews.title: Great for cost.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. I however have only used it once so can’t attest to durability
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Harris

customer_reviews.title: It showed up super quick and I got it just in time for ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly what i was looking for. It showed up super quick and I got it just in time for my trip. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Youngsma

customer_reviews.title: This is a SWEETHEART of a garment bag in a desert 🌵 of good ones.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I got this. It is a fantastic piece of engineering. I’m in the travel business and I know what I’m talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Price

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bag was great for carrying my wedding suit to Seattle. It's made very well, it has lots of other pockets for other things and it folds nicely. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carry-on!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a trip using this bag. It was perfect for mu suit and some other things.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Smelled awful
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to air it out for several days. So far it works for him after the airing out.
customer_reviews.author: Pamstuff

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good used on a cruise and it carried 3 dresses 2 dress pants and 3 shirts all on hangers. There was still more room... Long dresses and pants will have to be folded but overall very good product and good size for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed. This is great for a carry on. Big enough to pack for a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: CCCjr

product_meta.title: Prottoni 44-inch Garment Bag for Travel – Water-Resistant Carry-On Suit Carrier
feature_bullets: ✔ EXTRA STRONG TO LAST LONG… due to being made from reinforced, water-resistant 600D Polyester, this garment bag provides sturdy protection for suits, dress and dance costumes
✔ NO-SNAG ZIPPERED POCKETS… the Prottoni suit bag keeps your items secure with 4 deep external pockets for laptops, shoes & accessories, and 2 internal ones for underwear, toiletries & ties
✔ REINFORCED HANDLES & HANGING HOOK… strengthened fabric hoops prevent hangers slipping out which means your clothes will arrive at their destination crease-free and ready to wear
✔ EU DESIGN & QUALITY-CHECKED… every suit travel bag is scrutinized before delivery to ensure that you receive the best product without disappointment; makes a great gift for a traveling friend

✔ EXTENDED WARRANTY… garment bags need to handle life as you travel, and at Prottoni we have increased our guarantee to one full year because we know how accomplished these suit carriers are; simply contact us through Amazon and we’ll be on the case!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars430 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
